get.description:
# Insights into the travelersâ€™ booking patterns 

The competitors set is calculated based on: 
* price: it contains hotels with an ADR of +/- 10% of hotel ADR in last 12 months 
* proximity: circle radius expands from 3km to 6km to 9km and stops when at least 4 hotels are included in your competitors set.  
  If less than 4 hotels are found at the 9km radius mark, no comp set will be displayed for that hotel

category.description: Can be brand or travelerOrigination because this endpoint returns data by brand or traveler country.

caption.description: If category:brand this property contains the name of the brand, if category:travelerOrigination this property contains the country code(3 letters)

l28d_compset_cy.description: Brand/Country contribution to competitors production in terms of room nights for last 28 days of current year

l28d_compset_ly.description: Brand/Country contribution to competitors production in terms of room nights for last 28 days of last year

l90d_compset_cy.description: Brand/Country contribution to competitors production in terms of room nights for last 90 days of current year

l90d_compset_ly.description: Brand/Country contribution to competitors production in terms of room nights for last 90 days of last year

l28d_hotel_cy.description: Brand/Country contribution to hotel production in terms of room nights for last 28 days of current year

l28d_hotel_ly.description: Brand/Country contribution to hotel production in terms of room nights for last 28 days of last year

l90d_hotel_cy.description: Brand/Country contribution to hotel production in terms of room nights for last 90 days of current year

l90d_hotel_ly.description: Brand/Country contribution to hotel production in terms of room nights for last 90 days of last year

get.description:
# Hotel and competitors performance for past and future stay dates.

 * Year To Date Stays(ytd): represents the YOY production trend (for hotel and competitors) considering all stay dates starting beginning of the year until the report date.
 * Next Week Stays(nw): represents the YOY production trend considering all stay dates for the week following the report date.
 * Next 4 Weeks Stays(n4w): represents the YOY production trend considering all stay dates for the 4 weeks following the report date.
 * Net Room Night Count(nrn) : represents the total number of reservations the hotel will deliver (if cancellations are made, then they are considered in the calculation).
 * Average Daily Rate(adr) : base rate per room night for hotel rooms.

The competitors set is calculated based on: 
* price: it contains hotels with an ADR of +/- 10% of hotel ADR in last 12 months 
* proximity: circle radius expands from 3km to 6km to 9km and stops when at least 4 hotels are included in your competitors set.  
  If less than 4 hotels are found at the 9km radius mark, no comp set will be displayed for that hotel

ytd_hotel_nrn_delta.description: Year To Date Hotel Net Room Night Delta

ytd_hotel_adr_delta.description: Year To Date Hotel Average Daily Rate Delta

ytd_compset_nrn_delta.description: Year To Date Competitors Set Net Room Night Delta

ytd_compset_adr_delta.description: Year To Date Competitors Set Average Daily Rate  Delta

nw_hotel_adr_delta.description: Next Week Hotel Average Daily Rate Delta

nw_compset_nrn_delta.description: Next Week Competitors Set Net Room Night Delta

nw_compset_adr_delta.description: Next Week Competitors Set Average Daily Rate Delta

n4w_hotel_nrn_delta.description: Next 4 Weeks Hotel Net Room Night Delta

n4w_hotel_adr_delta.description: Next 4 Weeks Hotel Average Daily Rate Delta

n4w_compset_nrn_delta.description: Next 4 Weeks Competitors Set Net Room Night Delta

n4w_compset_adr_delta.description: Next 4 Weeks Competitors Set Average Daily Rate Delta
